verses.name: Luke 9:55
verses.text: But he turned, and rebuked them, and said, Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of.

verses.name: Luke 9:56
verses.text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men’s lives, but to save them. And they went to another village.

verses.name: Luke 9:57
verses.text: And it came to pass, that, as they went in the way, a certain man said unto him, Lord, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.

verses.name: Luke 9:58
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Foxes have holes, and birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.
